text: "All Those Years Ago" is a 1981 song by George Harrison. It was taken from his ninth studio album Somewhere in England. It pays tribute to fellow Beatles member John Lennon following his murder. It was at the top of the single charts in Canada, number 2 in the United States and Norway and number 4 in Ireland. Category:1981 songs Category:George Harrison songs Category:Pop rock songs Category:John Lennon
title: All Those Years Ago
